titles.title: Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Shiawase no Mahou
オシャレ魔女 ラブ and ベリー しあわせのまほう

anime.description: * Based on an arcade collectible card game by Sega, aimed at young girls. Love and Berry, two princesses who posess fashion magic, are best friends. But when they`re on the dance floor, they become rivals for attention.

externalentity.identifier: オシャレ魔女_ラブandベリー

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

character.name: Love
character.description: Style: Cute Hobbies: Dancing, Window shopping Favorite food: Shortcake Favorite flower: Sunflower Charming features: Eyes, Cheeks
